Directorates of the Joint Staff

The Joint Staff includes the following departments where all the planning, policies, training, manpower, communications and security functions are translated into action.

J1 - Manpower and Personnel

J2/3 - Operations and Intelligence

J5 - Plans and Relations

J6 - Information and Security

J7 - Force Development
